</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3">
<DIV id="id_3_1">
<P class="p1448 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(1)[</SPAN>Request for Recordation of a Change in Applicant or Owner<SPAN class="ft4">]</SPAN></P>
<P class="p190 ft32"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft195">Where there is a change in the person of the applicant or owner, a Contracting Party shall accept that</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3_2">
<P class="p1196 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">1.[</SPAN>Begäran om införing av ändring</P>
<P class="p1193 ft8"><SPAN class="ft26">beträffande sökande eller innehavare</SPAN>] a) I det fall det skett en ändring beträffande sökandens eller</P>
<P class="p1196 ft88">innehavarens person skall en</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">439</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_440">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p81 ft6">a request for recordation of the change be made in a communica- tion signed by the applicant or owner, or by the new applicant or new owner, and containing the following indications:</P>
<P class="p1432 ft4">(i)an indication to the effect that a recordation of change in applicant or owner is requested;</P>
<P class="p1182 ft4">(ii)the number of the application or patent concerned;</P>
<P class="p1183 ft4">(iii)the name and address of the applicant or owner;</P>
<P class="p1182 ft4">(iv)the name and address of the new applicant or new owner;</P>
<P class="p1235 ft8">(v)the date of the change in the person of the applicant or owner;</P>
<P class="p1359 ft6">(vi)the name of a State of which the new applicant or new owner is a national if he is the national of any State, the name of a State in which the new applicant or new owner has his domicile, if any, and the name of a State in which the new applicant or new owner has a real and effective industrial or commercial establishment, if any;</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p71 ft4">fördragsslutande part godta en Prop. 2006/07:56 begäran om införing av ändringen, Bilaga 9</P>
<P class="p1411 ft32">när begäran görs i en kommunikation som är signerad av sökanden eller innehavaren eller av den nye sökanden eller den nye innehavaren och innehåller följande:</P>
<P class="p1241 ft4">i)en upplysning om att införing av ändring beträffande sökanden eller innehavaren begärs.</P>
<P class="p1327 ft4">ii)nummer för ifrågavarande ansökan eller patent.</P>
<P class="p1430 ft4">iii)sökandens eller innehavarens namn och adress.</P>
<P class="p1327 ft4">iv)den nye sökandens eller den nye innehavarens namn och adress.</P>
<P class="p1449 ft8">v)datum för ändringen beträffande ägare eller innehavare.</P>
<P class="p1450 ft32">vi)namnet på den stat där den nye sökanden eller den nye innehavaren har medborgarskap, om statsmedborgarskap föreligger, vidare, i förekommande fall, namnet på den stat i vilken den nye sökanden eller innehavaren är</P>
<P class="p1248 ft4">hemmahörande, samt, i förekommande fall namnet på den stat där den nye sökanden eller den nye innehavaren har reell och faktisk industriell eller kom- mersiell verksamhet.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p81 ft4">(vii)the basis for the change requested.</P>
<P class="p1189 ft4">(b)A Contracting Party may require that the request contain:</P>
<P class="p1184 ft4">(i)a statement that the information contained in the request is true and correct;</P>
<P class="p1189 ft4">(ii)information relating to any government interest by that</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p1451 ft4">vii)grunden för den begärda ändringen.</P>
<P class="p1452 ft4">b)En fördragsslutande part får kräva att begäran innehåller</P>
<P class="p1453 ft4">i)en förklaring om att de uppgifter som lämnats är sanna och korrekta,</P>
<P class="p1454 ft4">ii)uppgifter som rör något stats-</P>
<P class="p1455 ft76">intresse hos den fördragsslutande</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">440</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_441">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p71 ft4">Contracting Party.</P>
<P class="p1202 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(2)[</SPAN>Documentation of the Basis of the Change in Applicant or Owner<SPAN class="ft4">] (a) Where the change in applicant or owner results from a contract, a Contracting Party may require that the request include information relating to the registration of the contract, where registration is compulsory under the applicable law, and that it be accompanied, at the option of the requesting party, by one of the following:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1188 ft32">(i)a copy of the contract, which copy may be required to be certi- fied, at the option of the requesting party, by a notary public or any other competent public authority or, where permitted under the applicable law, by a representative having the right to practice before the Office, as being in conformity with the original contract;</P>
<P class="p1188 ft79">(ii)an extract of the contract showing the change, which extract may be required to be certified, at the option of the requesting party, by a notary public or any other competent public authority or, where permitted under the applicable law, by a representative having the right to practice before the Office, as being a true extract of the contract;</P>
<P class="p1456 ft6">(iii)an uncertified certificate of transfer of ownership by contract drawn up with the content as prescribed in the Model Inter- national Form in respect of a certificate of transfer and signed by both the applicant and the new applicant, or by both the owner and the new owner.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t100">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr9 td312"><P class="p3 ft4">parten.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr9 td17"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr9 td235"><P class="p1457 ft7">Prop. 2006/07:56</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td312"><P class="p3 ft12">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td17"><P class="p3 ft12">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td235"><P class="p1457 ft13">Bilaga 9</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td85"><P class="p3 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">2.[</SPAN>Dokumentation om grunden för</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td85"><P class="p3 ft5">ändring beträffande sökande eller</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td312"><P class="p3 ft5">innehavare<SPAN class="ft4">]</SPAN></P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td17"><P class="p119 ft4">a)</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td235"><P class="p19 ft4">En</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td312"><P class="p3 ft8">fördragsslutande</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td17"><P class="p3 ft4">part får, för</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td235"><P class="p19 ft7">det</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P class="p1240 ft6">fall ändringen beträffande sökande eller innehavare grundas på avtal, kräva att begäran innehåller uppgifter om registrering av avtalet, när sådan registrering är obligatorisk enligt gällande lag, och att till uppgifterna fogas ettdera av följande, vilket den som gör begäran har frihet att välja:</P>
<P class="p1241 ft6">i)en kopia av avtalet, varvid får krävas att kopians överens- stämmelse med originalavtalet är bestyrkt av, efter vad den som gjort begäran fritt väljer, notarius publicus eller någon annan behörig offentlig myndighet eller, om det är tillåtet enligt gällande lag, av ett ombud som har rätt att uppträda inför patentmyndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1306 ft6">ii)ett utdrag av avtalet som utvisar ändringen, varvid får krävas att ut- draget från originalavtalet är bestyrkt av, efter vad den som gjort begäran fritt väljer, notarius publicus eller någon annan behörig offentlig myndighet eller, om det är tillåtet enligt gällande lag, av ett ombud som har rätt att uppträda inför patentmyndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1427 ft32">iii)ett obestyrkt intyg om att inne- havet har överförts genom ett avtal, förutsatt att intyget utformats i över- ensstämmelse med föreskrivet inter- nationellt standardformulär beträff- ande intyg om överföring, och intyget är signerat av både sökanden och den nye sökanden, eller av både innehavaren och den nye innehavaren.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t37">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr13 td137"><P class="p3 ft4">(b)Where the change in applicant b)En fördragsslutande part får, för</P></TD>
	<TD rowspan=2 class="tr0 td71"><P class="p17 ft4">441</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr18 td137"><P class="p3 ft75">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_442">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p81 ft79">or owner results from a merger, or from the reorganization or division of a legal entity, a Contracting Party may require that the request be accompanied by a copy of a document, which document originates from a competent authority and evidences the merger, or the reorganization or division of the legal entity, and any attribution of rights involved, such as a copy of an extract from a register of commerce. A Contracting Party may also require that the copy be certified, at the option of the requesting party, by the authority which issued the document or by a notary public or any other competent public authority or, where permitted under the applicable law, by a representative having the right to practice before the Office, as being in conformity with the original document.</P>
<P class="p1458 ft6">(c)Where the change in applicant or owner does not result from a contract, a merger, or the reorganization or division of a legal entity, but results from another ground, for example, by operation of law or a court decision, a Contracting Party may require that the request be accompanied by a copy of a document evidencing the change. A Contracting Party may also require that the copy be certified as being in conformity with the original document, at the option of the requesting party, by the authority which issued the document or by a notary public or any other competent public authority or, where permitted under the applicable law, by a representative having the right to practice before the Office.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p71 ft4">det fall ändringen beträffande Prop. 2006/07:56 sökande eller innehavare grundas Bilaga 9</P>
<P class="p1411 ft32">på fusion eller på omstrukturering eller delning av en juridisk person, kräva att begäran åtföljs av en kopia av en handling som utfärdats av en behörig myndighet och som styrker fusionen, omstrukturering- en eller delningen av den juridiska personen, samt styrker före- kommande rättsliga befogenheter, exempelvis en kopia av ett</P>
<P class="p1240 ft32">handelsregisterutdrag. En fördragsslutande part får vidare kräva att kopians överens- stämmelse med originalhandlingen är bestyrkt av, efter vad den som gjort begäran fritt väljer, den</P>
<P class="p1312 ft4">myndighet som utfärdat handlingen, av notarius publicus, av någon annan behörig offentlig myndighet eller, om det är tillåtet enligt gällande lag, av ett ombud som har rätt att uppträda inför patentmyndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1241 ft6">c)En fördragsslutande part får, för det fall ändringen beträffande sökande eller innehavare inte grundas på avtal, fusion, om- strukturering eller delning av en juridisk person, utan har någon annan grund, exempelvis rätts- tillämpning eller domstols- avgörande, kräva att begäran åtföljs av en kopia av en handling som styrker ändringen. En fördragsslutande part får vidare kräva att kopians överens- stämmelse med originalhandlingen är bestyrkt av, efter vad den som gjort begäran fritt väljer, den myndighet som utfärdat hand- lingen, av notarius publicus, av någon annan behörig offentlig myndighet eller, om det är tillåtet enligt gällande lag, av ett ombud som har rätt att uppträda inför patentmyndigheten.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t37">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr13 td137"><P class="p3 ft4">(d)Where the change is in the d)En fördragsslutande part får, för</P></TD>
	<TD rowspan=2 class="tr0 td71"><P class="p17 ft4">442</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr18 td137"><P class="p3 ft75">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_443">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p81 ft32">person of one or more but not all of several <NOBR>co-applicants</NOBR> or <NOBR>co-owners,</NOBR> a Contracting Party may require that evidence of the consent to the change of any <NOBR>co-applicant</NOBR> or co- owner in respect of whom there is no change be provided to the Office.</P>
<P class="p1181 ft8">(3)[<SPAN class="ft26">Translation</SPAN>] A Contracting Party may require a translation of any document filed under paragraph (2) that is not in a language accepted by the Office.</P>
<P class="p1459 ft4">(4)[<SPAN class="ft5">Fees</SPAN>] A Contracting Party may require that a fee be paid in respect of a request referred to in paragraph (1).</P>
<P class="p1189 ft6">(5)[<SPAN class="ft33">Single Request</SPAN>] A single request shall be sufficient even where the change relates to more than one application or patent of the same person, or to one or more applications and one or more patents of the same person, provided that the change in applicant or owner is the same for all applications and patents concerned, and the numbers of all applications and patents concerned are indicated in the request. A Contracting Party may require that, where that single request is filed on paper or as otherwise permitted by the Office, a separate copy thereof be filed for each application and patent to which it relates.</P>
<P class="p1359 ft6">(6)[<SPAN class="ft33">Evidence</SPAN>] A Contracting Party may require that evidence, or further evidence in the case of paragraph (2), be filed with the Office only where that Office may reasonably doubt the veracity of any indication contained in the request or in any document referred to in the present Rule, or</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p163 ft4">det fall ändringen rör en av flera av, men inte samtliga, sökande eller innehavare, kräva att det till</P>
<P class="p163 ft4">patentmyndigheten ges in bevisning som styrker att samtliga de medsökande eller innehavare som inte omfattas av ändringen, samtyckt till den.</P>
<P class="p1460 ft4">3.[<SPAN class="ft5">Översättning</SPAN>] En fördrags- slutande part får kräva översättning av handlingar som getts in enligt punkt 2 och som inte är på något språk som godtas av patent- myndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1189 ft32">4.[<SPAN class="ft31">Avgifter</SPAN>] En fördragsslutande part får kräva att en avgift skall betalas för en begäran enligt punkt 1.</P>
<P class="p1181 ft32">5.[<SPAN class="ft31">En enda begäran</SPAN>] En enda begäran skall vara tillfyllest också när den ändringen gäller mer än en ansökan eller mer än ett patent för samma person, eller till en eller flera ansökningar eller ett eller flera patent för samma person, förutsatt att ändringen beträffande sökande eller innehavare är densamma för alla ansökningar och patent som är i fråga, och nummer för samtliga ansökningar och patent är angivna i begäran. En fördragsslutande part får, när en enda begäran ges in i pappersform eller i den form som i övrigt godtas av patentmyndigheten, kräva att en separat kopia av handlingen ges in för varje ansökan och patent som den hänför sig till.</P>
<P class="p1461 ft32">6.[<SPAN class="ft31">Bevisning</SPAN>] En fördragsslutande part får kräva att bevisning, eller bevisning som går utöver vad som är tillåtet enligt punkt 2, ges in till patentmyndigheten endast då patentmyndigheten har skälig anledning att ifrågasätta riktigheten av någon uppgift i begäran eller i någon handling som avses i denna</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3">
<P class="p599 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 9</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">443</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_444">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p543 ft4">the accuracy of any translation referred to in paragraph (3).</P>
<P class="p1414 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(7)[</SPAN>Prohibition of Other Require- ments<SPAN class="ft4">] No Contracting Party may require that formal requirements other than those referred to in paragraphs (1) to (6) be complied with in respect of the request referred to in this Rule, except where otherwise provided for by the Treaty or prescribed in these Regulations.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1188 ft8">(8)[<SPAN class="ft26">Notification; </SPAN><NOBR><SPAN class="ft26">Non-Compliance</SPAN></NOBR><SPAN class="ft26"> with Requirements</SPAN>] Rule 15(6) and</P>
<P class="p1187 ft32"><SPAN class="ft7">(7)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft169">shall apply, mutatis mutandis, where one or more of the require- ments applied under paragraphs (1) to (5) are not complied with, or where evidence, or further evidence, is required under paragraph (6).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1381 ft8">(9)[<SPAN class="ft26">Exclusion with Respect to Inventorship</SPAN>] A Contracting Party may exclude the application of this Rule in respect of changes in inventorship. What constitutes inventorship shall be determined under the applicable law.</P>
<P class="p1462 ft4">Rule 17</P>
<P class="p543 ft5">Request for Recordation of a License or a Security Interest</P>
<P class="p67 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(1)[</SPAN>Request for Recordation of a</P>
<P class="p1187 ft6"><SPAN class="ft33">License</SPAN>](a) Where a license in respect of an application or patent may be recorded under the applicable law, the Contracting Party shall accept that a request for recordation of that license be made in a communication signed by the licensor or the licensee and</P>
<P class="p543 ft4">containing the following indications:</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p244 ft4">regel, eller att ifrågasätta att en Prop. 2006/07:56 översättning som avses i punkt 3 är Bilaga 9 korrekt.</P>
<P class="p861 ft6">7.[<SPAN class="ft33">Förbud för ytterligare krav</SPAN>] Ingen fördragsslutande part får, med avseende på en begäran enligt denna regel, ställa upp formaliakrav utöver vad som nämns i punkterna <NOBR>1–6,</NOBR> om annat inte följer av fördraget eller är</P>
<P class="p859 ft4">föreskrivet i dessa tillämpningsföreskrifter.</P>
<P class="p1259 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">8.[</SPAN>Underrättelse, bristande kravuppfyllelse<SPAN class="ft4">] Regel 15.6 och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p857 ft6"><SPAN class="ft7">15.7</SPAN><SPAN class="ft178">skall gälla i tillämpliga delar, om ett eller flera av de krav som föreskrivits med stöd av punkterna </SPAN><NOBR>1–5</NOBR> inte har uppfyllts, eller om bevisning eller ytterligare bevis- ning krävs med stöd av punkt 6.</P>
<P class="p1463 ft31"><SPAN class="ft32">9.[</SPAN>Undantag med avseende på uppfinnare<SPAN class="ft32">] En fördragsslutande part får föreskriva att denna regel inte skall tillämpas i fråga om ändring av uppfinnare. Frågan om innebörden av begreppet uppfinnare skall bedömas enligt gällande lag.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1415 ft4">Regel 17</P>
<P class="p859 ft5">Begäran om införing av en licens eller en säkerhetsrätt</P>
<P class="p67 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">1.[</SPAN>Begäran om införing av en</P>
<P class="p857 ft6"><SPAN class="ft33">licen</SPAN>s] a) Om registrering av licenser kan ske enligt gällande lag, skall den fördragsslutande parten godta att en begäran om införing av en licens görs i en kommunikation som är signerad av licensgivaren och lisenstagaren och innehåller följande:</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p71 ft209">(i)an indication to the effect that a recordation of a license is requested;</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p1196 ft4">i)en upplysning om att införing av</P>
<P class="p1196 ft76">en licens begärs.</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">444</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_445">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p196 ft4">(ii)the number of the application or patent concerned;</P>
<P class="p1183 ft4">(iii)the name and address of the licensor;</P>
<P class="p1182 ft4">(iv)the name and address of the licensee;</P>
<P class="p1183 ft4">(v)an indication of whether the license is an exclusive license or a <NOBR>non-exclusive</NOBR> license;</P>
<P class="p1189 ft32">(vi)the name of a State of which the licensee is a national if he is the national of any State, the name of a State in which the licensee has his domicile, if any, and the name of a State in which the licensee has a real and effective industrial or commercial establishment, if any.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p1464 ft4">Prop. 2006/07:56</P>
<P class="p1465 ft4">ii)nummer för ifrågavarande Bilaga 9 ansökan eller patent.</P>
<P class="p1466 ft4">iii)licensgivarens namn och adress.</P>
<P class="p1467 ft4">iv)licenstagarens namn och adress.</P>
<P class="p1468 ft4">v)uppgift om huruvida det är fråga om en exklusiv licens eller en enkel licens.</P>
<P class="p1217 ft6">vi)namnet på den stat där licenstagaren har medborgarskap, om statsmedborgarskap föreligger, vidare, i förekommande fall, namnet på den stat i vilken licenstagaren har sitt hemvist, samt, i förekommande fall namnet på den stat där licenstagaren har reell och faktisk industriell eller kommersiell verksamhet.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p196 ft4">(b)A Contracting Party may require that the request contain:</P>
<P class="p1183 ft4">(i)a statement that the information contained in the request is true and correct;</P>
<P class="p1182 ft4">(ii)information relating to any government interest by that Contracting Party;</P>
<P class="p1189 ft4">(iii)information relating to the registration of the license, where registration is compulsory under the applicable law;</P>
<P class="p1183 ft4">(iv)the date of the license and its duration.</P>
<P class="p1189 ft8">(2)[<SPAN class="ft26">Documentation of the Basis of the License</SPAN>] (a) Where the license is a freely concluded agreement, a Contracting Party may require that the request be accompanied, at the option of the requesting party, by one of the following:</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p1256 ft4">b)En fördragsslutande part får kräva att begäran innehåller</P>
<P class="p1469 ft4">i)en försäkran att uppgifterna i begäran är sanna och korrekta,</P>
<P class="p1470 ft4">ii)uppgifter som rör något stats- intresse hos den fördragsslutande parten,</P>
<P class="p1217 ft8">iii)uppgifter om registrering av licensen, när sådan registrering är obligatorisk enligt gällande lag,</P>
<P class="p1471 ft4">iv)datum för licensupplåtelsen och uppgift om dess giltighetstid.</P>
<P class="p1217 ft8">2.[<SPAN class="ft26">Dokumentation om grunden för licens</SPAN>] a) En fördragsslutande part får, för det fall att licensen grundas på ett frivilligt ingånget avtal, kräva att det till begäran fogas ettdera av följande, vilket den som</P>
<P class="p1196 ft80">gör begäran har frihet att välja:</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">445</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_446">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p81 ft32">(i)a copy of the agreement, which copy may be required to be certi- fied, at the option of the requesting party, by a notary public or any other competent public authority or, where permitted under the applicable law, by a representative having the right to practice before the Office, as being in conformity with the original agreement;</P>
<P class="p1242 ft32">(ii)an extract of the agreement consisting of those portions of that agreement which show the rights licensed and their extent, which extract may be required to be certi- fied, at the option of the requesting party, by a notary public or any other competent public authority or, where permitted under the applicable law, by a representative having the right to practice before the Office, as being a true extract of the agreement.</P>
<P class="p1242 ft6">(b)A Contracting Party may require, where the license is a freely concluded agreement, that any applicant, owner, exclusive licensee, <NOBR>co-applicant,</NOBR> <NOBR>co-owner</NOBR> or <NOBR>co-exclusive</NOBR> licensee who is not party to that agreement give his consent to the recordation of the agreement in a communication to the Office.</P>
<P class="p1242 ft32">(c)Where the license is not a freely concluded agreement, for example, it results from operation of law or a court decision, a Contracting Party may require that the request be accompanied by a copy of a document evidencing the license. A Contracting Party may also require that the copy be certified as being in conformity with the original document, at the option of the requesting party, by the authority which issued the document or by a notary public or any other</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p81 ft6">i)En kopia av avtalet, varvid får krävas att kopians överens- stämmelse med originalavtalet är bestyrkt av, efter vad den som gjort begäran fritt väljer, notarius publicus eller någon annan behörig offentlig myndighet eller, om det är tillåtet enligt gällande lag, av ett ombud som har rätt att uppträda inför patentmyndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1242 ft6">ii)Ett utdrag av avtalet som återger de delar av detta, varav framgår de rättigheter som licensierats och omfattningen av dem, varvid får krävas att utdraget från original- avtalet är bestyrkt av, efter vad den som gjort begäran fritt väljer, notarius publicus eller någon annan behörig offentlig myndighet eller, om det är tillåtet enligt gällande lag, av ett ombud som har rätt att uppträda inför patent- myndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1242 ft32">b)En fördragsslutande part får, för det fall att licensen grundas på ett frivilligt ingånget avtal, kräva att envar de sökande, innehavare av exklusiv licens, medsökande, sam- innehavare eller saminnehavare av exklusiv licens, som inte är part i licensavtalet, i en kommunikation till patentmyndigheten samtycker till införing av avtalet.</P>
<P class="p1242 ft32">c)En fördragsslutande part får, för det fall att licensen inte grundas på ett frivilligt ingånget avtal utan på exempelvis rättstillämpning eller domstolsavgörande, kräva att begäran åtföljs av en kopia av en handling som styrker licensrätten. En fördragsslutande part får vidare kräva att kopians överens- stämmelse med originalhandlingen är bestyrkt av, efter vad den som gjort begäran fritt väljer, den</P>
<P class="p598 ft8">myndighet som utfärdat handlingen, av notarius publicus,</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3">
<P class="p599 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 9</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">446</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_447">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p196 ft4">competent public authority or, where permitted under the applicable law, by a representative having the right to practice before the Office.</P>
<P class="p1189 ft8">(3)[<SPAN class="ft26">Translation</SPAN>] A Contracting Party may require a translation of any document filed under paragraph (2) that is not in a language accepted by the Office.</P>
<P class="p1472 ft218">(4)[<SPAN class="ft217">Fees</SPAN>] A Contracting Party may require that a fee be paid in respect of a request referred to in paragraph (1).</P>
<P class="p1184 ft32">(5)[<SPAN class="ft31">Single Request</SPAN>] Rule 16(5) shall apply, mutatis mutandis, to requests for recordation of a license.</P>
<P class="p1181 ft32">(6)[<SPAN class="ft31">Evidence</SPAN>] Rule 16(6) shall apply, mutatis mutandis, to requests for recordation of a license.</P>
<P class="p1189 ft6">(7)[<SPAN class="ft33">Prohibition of Other Require- ments</SPAN>] No Contracting Party may require that formal requirements other than those referred to in para- graphs (1) to (6) be complied with in respect of the request referred to in paragraph (1), except where otherwise provided for by the Treaty or prescribed in these Regulations.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p71 ft8">(8)[<SPAN class="ft26">Notification; </SPAN><NOBR><SPAN class="ft26">Non-Compliance</SPAN></NOBR><SPAN class="ft26"> with Requirements</SPAN>] Rule 15(6) and</P>
<P class="p81 ft32"><SPAN class="ft7">(7)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft169">shall apply, mutatis mutandis, where one or more of the require- ments applied under paragraphs (1) to (5) are not complied with, or where evidence, or further evidence, is required under paragraph (6).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1181 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(9)[</SPAN>Request for Recordation of a Security Interest or Cancellation of the Recordation of a License or</P>
<P class="p168 ft5"><SPAN class="ft5">a</SPAN><SPAN class="ft49">Security Interest</SPAN><SPAN class="ft4">] Paragraphs (1) to (8) shall apply, mutatis</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p1473 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">8.[</SPAN>Underrättelse, bristande kravuppfyllelse<SPAN class="ft4">] Regel 15.6 och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1326 ft6"><SPAN class="ft7">15.7</SPAN><SPAN class="ft178">skall gälla i tillämpliga delar, om ett eller flera av de krav som föreskrivits med stöd av punkterna </SPAN><NOBR>1–5</NOBR> inte har uppfyllts, eller om bevisning eller ytterligare bevis- ning krävs med stöd av punkt 6.</P>
<P class="p1474 ft47"><SPAN class="ft13">9.[</SPAN>Begäran om införing av en säkerhetsrätt eller om avförande av en licens eller säkerhetsrätt<SPAN class="ft13">] Punkterna </SPAN><NOBR><SPAN class="ft13">1–8</SPAN></NOBR><SPAN class="ft13"> skall i tillämpliga delar gälla i fråga om</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1475 ft4">447</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_448">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p71 ft4">mutandis, to requests for:</P>
<P class="p1200 ft4">(i)recordation of a security interest in respect of an application or patent;</P>
<P class="p1199 ft32">(ii)cancellation of the recordation of a license or a security interest in respect of an application or patent.</P>
<P class="p1425 ft4">Rule 18</P>
<P class="p544 ft5">Request for Correction of a Mistake</P>
<P class="p1202 ft6">(1)[<SPAN class="ft33">Request</SPAN>] (a) Where an applic- ation, a patent or any request communicated to the Office in respect of an application or a patent contains a mistake, not related to search or substantive examination, which is correctable by the Office under the applicable law, the Office shall accept that a request for correction of that mistake in the records and publications of the Office be made in a communication to the Office signed by the applicant or owner and containing the following indications:</P>
<P class="p1188 ft17">(i)an indication to the effect that a correction of mistake is requested;</P>
<P class="p1268 ft4">(ii)the number of the application or patent concerned;</P>
<P class="p67 ft4">(iii)the mistake to be corrected;</P>
<P class="p307 ft4">(iv)the correction to be made;</P>
<P class="p1244 ft4">(v)the name and address of the requesting party.</P>
<P class="p1202 ft32">(b)A Contracting Party may require that the request be accompanied by a replacement part or part incorporating the correction or, where paragraph (3) applies, by</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p1476 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 9</P>
<P class="p650 ft209">i)införing av en säkerhetsrätt avseende en ansökan eller ett patent,</P>
<P class="p1267 ft209">ii)avförande av en registrering av en licens eller en säkerhetsrätt avseende en ansökan eller ett patent.</P>
<P class="p960 ft4">Regel 18</P>
<P class="p339 ft5">Begäran om rättelse av misstag</P>
<P class="p1245 ft32">1.[<SPAN class="ft31">Begäran</SPAN>] a) Om en ansökan, ett patent eller någon begäran rörande en ansökan eller ett patent, som givits in till patentmyndigheten, innehåller en felaktighet, som inte</P>
<P class="p1211 ft6">rör nyhetsgranskning eller patenterbarhetsprövning, och som patentmyndigheten har möjlighet att rätta enligt gällande lag, skall patentmyndigheten godta en</P>
<P class="p1211 ft32">begäran om rättelse i patentmyndighetens register och publikationer, när begäran görs i en kommunikation som är signerad av sökanden eller innehavaren och innehåller följande:</P>
<P class="p1260 ft4">i)En upplysning om att rättelse begärs.</P>
<P class="p1192 ft4">ii)Nummer för ifrågavarande ansökan eller patent.</P>
<P class="p1260 ft4">iii)Uppgift om vad som skall rättas.</P>
<P class="p1192 ft4">iv)Uppgift om vilken rättelse som begärs.</P>
<P class="p1260 ft4">v)Namn och adress för den som gör begäran.</P>
<P class="p861 ft6">b)En fördragsslutande part får kräva att begäran åtföljs av en ersättningsdel eller en del varav rättelsen framgår eller, om punkt 3</P>
<P class="p71 ft135">är tillämplig, av en ersättningsdel</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">448</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_449">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p196 ft4">such a replacement part or part incorporating the correction for each application and patent to which the request relates.</P>
<P class="p1183 ft4">(c)A Contracting Party may require that the request be subject to a declaration by the requesting party stating that the mistake was made in good faith.</P>
<P class="p1189 ft6">(d)A Contracting Party may require that the request be subject to a declaration by the requesting party stating that the said request was made without undue delay or, at the option of the Contracting Party, that it was made without intentional delay, following the discovery of the mistake.</P>
<P class="p1389 ft4">(2)[<SPAN class="ft5">Fees</SPAN>](a) Subject to subparagraph (b), a Contracting Party may require t0hat a fee be paid in respect of a request under paragraph (1).</P>
<P class="p1182 ft4">(b)The Office shall correct its own mistakes, ex officio or upon request, for no fee.</P>
<P class="p1189 ft32">(3)[<SPAN class="ft31">Single Request</SPAN>] Rule 16(5) shall apply, mutatis mutandis, to requests for correction of a mistake, provided that the mistake and the requested correction are the same for all applications and patents concerned.</P>
<P class="p1181 ft6">(4)[<SPAN class="ft33">Evidence</SPAN>] A Contracting Party may only require that evidence in support of the request be filed with the Office where the Office may reasonably doubt that the alleged mistake is in fact a mistake, or where it may reasonably doubt the veracity of any matter contained in, or of any document filed in connection with, the request for correction of a mistake.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t111">

	<TD class="tr4 td40"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr41 td46"><P class="p3 ft4">d)En</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr41 td94"><P class="p61 ft4">fördragsslutande</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr41 td40"><P class="p140 ft4">part</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr41 td40"><P class="p291 ft4">får</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr41 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td58"><P class="p3 ft4">kräva att den som gör begäran</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr4 td58"><P class="p3 ft4">skall avge en förklaring att</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td166"><P class="p3 ft4">begäran</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td308"><P class="p3 ft4">gjorts</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td82"><P class="p3 ft4">utan</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td125"><P class="p291 ft4">oskäligt</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td166"><P class="p3 ft4">dröjsmål,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td308"><P class="p141 ft4">eller,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td211"><P class="p18 ft4">om</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td40"><P class="p291 ft7">den</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr6 td167"><P class="p3 ft8">fördragsslutande parten</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr6 td125"><P class="p291 ft4">så väljer,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr4 td313"><P class="p3 ft4">att begäran gjorts</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td82"><P class="p1 ft4">utan</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr4 td125"><P class="p291 ft4">avsiktligt</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P class="p1250 ft4">dröjsmål från det att misstaget upptäckts.</P>
<P class="p1469 ft4">2.[<SPAN class="ft5">Avgifter</SPAN>] a) En fördragsslutande part får, om annat inte följer av b) nedan, kräva att en avgift skall betalas för en begäran enligt punkt 1.</P>
<P class="p1195 ft4">b)Patentmyndigheten skall själv- mant eller på begäran rätta egna misstag utan avgift.</P>
<P class="p1195 ft4">3.[<SPAN class="ft5">En enda begäran</SPAN>] Regel 16.5 skall i tillämpliga delar gälla i fråga om begäran om rättelse, förutsatt att misstaget och den begärda rättelsen gäller lika för alla berörda ansökningar och patent.</P>
<P class="p1217 ft32">4.[<SPAN class="ft31">Bevisning</SPAN>] En fördragsslutande part får kräva att bevisning till stöd för begäran ges in till patentmyndig- heten endast då patentmyndigheten har skälig anledning att ifrågasätta att det påstådda misstaget verkligen utgjort ett misstag, eller då den har skälig anledning att ifrågasätta riktigheten av någon uppgift i begäran om rättelse eller i någon handling som givits in i samband</P>
<P class="p1196 ft92">med begäran.</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">449</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_450">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p81 ft6">(5)[<SPAN class="ft33">Prohibition of Other Require- ments</SPAN>] No Contracting Party may require that formal requirements other than those referred to in para- graphs (1) to (4) be complied with in respect of the request referred to in paragraph (1), except where otherwise provided for by the Treaty or prescribed in these Regulations.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p27 ft4">Prop. 2006/07:56</P>
<P class="p1372 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">5.[</SPAN>Förbud för ytterligare krav<SPAN class="ft4">] Bilaga 9 Ingen fördragsslutande part får,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1401 ft32">med avseende på en begäran enligt punkt 1, ställa upp formaliakrav utöver vad som nämns i punkterna <NOBR>1–4,</NOBR> om annat inte följer av fördraget eller är föreskrivet i dessa tillämpningsföreskrifter.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p1036 ft8">(6)[<SPAN class="ft26">Notification: </SPAN><NOBR><SPAN class="ft26">Non-Compliance</SPAN></NOBR><SPAN class="ft26"> with Requirements</SPAN>] Rule 15(6) and</P>
<P class="p1187 ft6"><SPAN class="ft8">(7)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft189">shall apply, mutatis mutandis, where one or more of the require- ments applied under paragraphs</SPAN></P>
<P class="p543 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(1)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft27">to (3) are not complied with, or where evidence is required under paragraph (4).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1199 ft6">(7)[<SPAN class="ft33">Exclusions</SPAN>](a) A Contracting Party may exclude the application of this Rule in respect of changes in inventorship. What constitutes inventorship shall be determined under the applicable law.</P>
<P class="p1202 ft32">(b)A Contracting Party may exclude the application of this Rule in respect of any mistake which must be corrected in that Contracting Party under a procedure for reissue of the patent.</P>
<P class="p1477 ft4">Rule 19</P>
<P class="p339 ft5">Manner of Identification of an</P>
<P class="p71 ft5">Application Without Its Application</P>
<P class="p71 ft5">Number</P>
<P class="p1202 ft79">(1)[Manner of Identification] Where it is required that an application be identified by its application number, but such a number has not yet been issued or is not known to the person concerned or his representative, the application shall be considered identified if one of the following is supplied, at that person’s option:</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p858 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">6.[</SPAN>Underrättelse, bristande kravuppfyllelse<SPAN class="ft4">] Regel 15.6 och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p859 ft4"><SPAN class="ft7">15.7</SPAN><SPAN class="ft21">skall gälla i tillämpliga delar, om ett eller flera av de krav som föreskrivits med stöd av punkt </SPAN><NOBR>1–3</NOBR> inte har uppfyllts, eller om bevisning krävs med stöd av punkt 4.</P>
<P class="p864 ft32">7.[<SPAN class="ft31">Undantag</SPAN>]a) En fördragsslutande part får föreskriva att denna regel inte skall tillämpas i fråga om ändring av uppfinnare. Frågan om innebörden av begreppet uppfinnare skall bedömas enligt gällande lag.</P>
<P class="p1260 ft4">b)En fördragsslutande part får föreskriva att denna regel inte skall tillämpas i fråga om misstag som i denna fördragsslutande part kan rättas endast genom ett förfarande för förnyat meddelande av patentet.</P>
<P class="p1415 ft4">Regel 19</P>
<P class="p853 ft5">Medel för identifiering av en ansökan utan ansökningsnummer</P>
<P class="p1426 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">1.[</SPAN>Medel för identifiering<SPAN class="ft4">] När det krävs att en ansökning skall identifieras genom ansöknings- nummer men ett sådant nummer ännu inte har tilldelats eller är okänt för berörd person eller dennes ombud, skall ansökan anses identifierad om, efter vad vederbörande fritt väljer, ettdera</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft92">av följande tillhandahålls:</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">450</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_451">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p543 ft4">(i)a provisional number for the application, if any, given by the Office;</P>
<P class="p1200 ft4">(ii)a copy of the request part of the application along with the date on which the application was sent to the Office;</P>
<P class="p1228 ft6">(iii)a reference number given to the application by the applicant or his representative and indicated in the application, along with the name and address of the applicant, the title of the invention and the date on which the application was sent to the Office.</P>
<P class="p1188 ft31"><SPAN class="ft32">(2)[</SPAN>Prohibition of Other Require- ments<SPAN class="ft32">] No Contracting Party may require that identification means other than those referred to in para- graph (1) be supplied in order for an application to be identified where its application number has not yet been issued or is not known to the person concerned or his representative.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1438 ft4">Rule 20</P>
<P class="p544 ft5">Establishment of Model Interna- tional Forms</P>
<P class="p1200 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(1)[</SPAN>Model International Forms<SPAN class="ft4">] The Assembly shall, under Article 14(1)(c), establish Model Interna- tional Forms, in each of the languages referred to in Article 25(1), in respect of:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p245 ft4">(i)a power of attorney;</P>
<P class="p1200 ft4">(ii)a request for recordation of change in name or address;</P>
<P class="p1200 ft4">(iii)a request for recordation of change in applicant or owner;</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p263 ft8">i)provisoriskt ansökningsnummer, om sådant har tilldelats av patent- myndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1478 ft6">ii)en kopia av den del av ansökan som utgör begäran, tillsammans med uppgift om det datum då</P>
<P class="p105 ft4">ansökan sändes till patentmyndigheten.</P>
<P class="p483 ft6">iii)ett referensnummer som sökan- den eller dennes ombud åsatt ansö- kan och som angivits i denna, tillsammans med uppgift om sökandens namn och adress, uppfinningens benämning och det datum då ansökan sändes till patentmyndigheten.</P>
<P class="p1382 ft31"><SPAN class="ft32">2.[</SPAN>Förbud för ytterligare krav<SPAN class="ft32">] Ingen fördragsslutande part får kräva några andra medel för identifiering än som nämns i punkt 1 för identifiering av en ansökan vars ansökningsnummer ännu inte har tilldelats eller är okänt för berörd person eller dennes ombud.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1440 ft4">Regel 20</P>
<P class="p105 ft5">Fastställande av internationella standardformulär</P>
<P class="p483 ft8">1.[<SPAN class="ft26">Internationella standard- formulär</SPAN>] Generalförsamlingen skall i enlighet med artikel 14.1 c)</P>
<P class="p1158 ft4">fastställa<SPAN style="padding-left:86px;">internationell blankettstandard på vart och ett av de språk som anges i artikel 25.1, med avseende på</SPAN></P>
<P class="p67 ft4">i)fullmakt,</P>
<P class="p504 ft4">ii)begäran om införing av ändring av namn eller adress,</P>
<P class="p139 ft4">iii)begäran om införing av ändring</P>
<P class="p105 ft4">beträffande sökande eller innehavare,</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3">
<P class="p515 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 9</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">451</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_452">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p71 ft4">(iv)a certificate of transfer;</P>
<P class="p1202 ft17">(v)a request for recordation, or can- cellation of recordation, of a license;</P>
<P class="p1268 ft4">(vi)a request for recordation, or cancellation of recordation, of a security interest;</P>
<P class="p1198 ft4">(vii)a request for correction of a mistake.</P>
<P class="p1199 ft31"><SPAN class="ft32">(2)[</SPAN>Modifications Referred to in Rule 3(2)(i<SPAN class="ft32">)] The Assembly shall establish the modifications of the Patent Cooperation Treaty request Form referred to in Rule 3(2)(i).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1244 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(3)[</SPAN>Proposals by the International Bureau<SPAN class="ft4">] The International Bureau shall present proposals to the Assembly concerning:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1198 ft4">(i)the establishment of Model International Forms referred to in paragraph (1);</P>
<P class="p1202 ft6">(ii)the modifications of the Patent Cooperation Treaty request Form referred to in paragraph (2).</P>
<P class="p1477 ft4">Rule 21</P>
<P class="p543 ft5">Requirement of Unanimity Under Article 14(3)</P>
<P class="p1198 ft4">Establishment or amendment of the following Rules shall require unanimity:</P>
<P class="p1479 ft4">(i)any Rules under Article 5(1)(a); (ii)any Rules under Article 6(1)(iii); (iii)any Rules under Article 6(3); (iv)any Rules under Article 7(2) a) (iii);</P>
<P class="p1480 ft8">(v)Rule 8(1)(a); (vi)The present Rule.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t100">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr9 td58"><P class="p3 ft4">iv)intyg om överföring,</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr9 td13"><P class="p3 ft7">Prop. 2006/07:56</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td58"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft4">Bilaga 9</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P class="p1211 ft4">v)begäran om införing, eller av- förande av registrering, av licens</P>
<P class="p1192 ft4">vi)begäran om införing, eller avförande av registrering, av säkerhetsrätt,</P>
<P class="p67 ft4">vii)begäran om rättelse av misstag.</P>
<P class="p1267 ft31"><SPAN class="ft32">2.[</SPAN>Avvikelser som avses i regel 3.2 i<SPAN class="ft32">)] Generalförsamlingen skall fastställa sådana avvikelser från konventionen om patentsamarbetes ansökningsformulär som avses i regel 3.2 i).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p864 ft31"><SPAN class="ft32">3.[</SPAN>Förslag av Internationella byrån<SPAN class="ft32">] Internationella byrån skall förelägga generalförsamlingen förslag om:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1259 ft4">i)fastställande av internationell blankettstandard som avses i punkt 1,</P>
<P class="p139 ft4">ii)de avvikelser från de</P>
<P class="p857 ft6">ansökningsformulär enligt konventionen om patentsamarbete som avses i punkt 2.</P>
<P class="p1415 ft4">Regel 21</P>
<P class="p859 ft5">Krav på enhällighet enligt artikel 14.3</P>
<P class="p1260 ft4">Beslut om att anta eller göra ändringar i följande regler skall kräva enhällighet:</P>
<P class="p858 ft4">i)Regler med stöd av artikel 5.1 a). ii)Regler med stöd av artikel 6.1 iii). iii)Regler med stöd av artikel 6.3. iv)Regler med stöd av artikel 7.2a) iii).</P>
<P class="p1481 ft8">v)Regel 8.1 a. vi)Denna regel.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p71 ft4">452</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_453">
<DIV id="p453dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356453x1.jpg/" id="p453img1">
</DIV>


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p1482 ft1">Utdrag ur konventionen om patentsamarbete i dess lydelse från och med den 1 april 2002</P>
<P class="p44 ft219">Article 22 – Copy, Translation, and Fee, to Designated Offices</P>
<P class="p1483 ft32"><SPAN class="ft8">(1)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft176">The applicant shall furnish a copy of the international application (unless the communication provided for in Article 20 has already taken place) and a translation thereof (as prescribed), and pay the national fee (if any), to each designated Office not later than at the expiration of 30* months from the priority date. Where the national law of the designated State requires the indication of the name of and other prescribed data concerning the inventor but allows that these indications be furnished at a time later than that of the filing of a national application, the applicant shall, unless they were contained in the request, furnish the said indications to the national Office of or acting for the State not later than at the expiration of 30* months from the priority date.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1093 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(2)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft37">Where the International Searching Authority makes a declaration, under Article 17(2)(a), that no international search report will be established, the time limit for performing the acts referred to in paragraph (1) of this Article shall be the same as that provided for in paragraph (1).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1093 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(3)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft86">Any national law may, for performing the acts referred to in paragraphs (1) or (2), fix time limits which expire later than the time limit provided for in those paragraphs.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p71 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 10</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p174 ft23">Rules 4.17, – Declarations Relating to National Requirements</P>
<P class="p174 ft23">Referred to in Rule 51bis.1(a)(i) to (v)</P>
<P class="p236 ft6">The request may, for the purposes of the national law applicable in one or more designated States, contain one or more of the following declarations, worded as prescribed by the Administrative Instructions:</P>
<P class="p1484 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft198">a declaration as to the identity of the inventor, as referred to in Rule 51bis.1(a)(i);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1485 ft4"><SPAN class="ft4">(ii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft38">a declaration as to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to apply for and be granted a patent, as referred to in Rule 51bis.1(a)(ii);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1486 ft4"><SPAN class="ft4">(iii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft87">a declaration as to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to claim priority of the earlier application, as referred to in Rule 51bis.1(a)(iii);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1485 ft4"><SPAN class="ft4">(iv)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">a declaration of inventorship, as referred to in Rule 51bis.1(a)(iv), which shall be signed as prescribed by the Administrative Instructions;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1487 ft4"><SPAN class="ft4">(v)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft177">a declaration as to </SPAN><NOBR>non-prejudicial</NOBR> disclosures or exceptions to lack of novelty, as referred to in Rule 51bis.1(a)(v).</P>
<P class="p1488 ft4">453</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_454">
<DIV id="p454dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356454x1.jpg/" id="p454img1">
</DIV>


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p71 ft23">4.18 – Additional Matter</P>
<P class="p246 ft8"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft63">The request shall contain no matter other than that specified in Rules</SPAN></P>
<P class="p105 ft4">4.1 to 4.17, provided that the Administrative Instructions may permit, but cannot make mandatory, the inclusion in the request of any additional matter specified in the Administrative Instructions.</P>
<P class="p506 ft32"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft127">If the request contains matter other than that specified in Rules 4.1 to 4.17 or permitted under paragraph (a) by the Administrative Instructions, the receiving Office shall </SPAN><SPAN class="ft31">ex officio </SPAN>delete the additional matter.</P>
<P class="p1489 ft23">Rule 26ter – Correction or Addition of Declarations Under Rule 4.17</P>
<P class="p266 ft8">26ter.1 – Correction or Addition of Declarations</P>
<P class="p316 ft6">The applicant may correct or add to the request any declaration referred to in Rule 4.17 by a notice submitted to the International Bureau within a time limit of 16 months from the priority date, provided that any notice which is received by the International Bureau after the expiration of that time limit shall be considered to have been received on the last day of that time limit if it reaches it before the technical preparations for international publication have been completed.</P>
<P class="p265 ft8">26ter.2 – Processing of Declarations</P>
<P class="p316 ft6"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft150">Where the receiving Office or the International Bureau finds that any declaration referred to in Rule 4.17 is not worded as required or, in the case of the declaration of inventorship referred to in Rule 4.17(iv), is not signed as required, the receiving Office or the International Bureau, as the case may be, may invite the applicant to correct the declaration within a time limit of 16 months from the priority date.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1382 ft17"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft203">Where the International Bureau receives any declaration or correction under Rule 26ter.1 after the expiration of the time limit under Rule 26ter.1, the International Bureau shall notify the applicant accordingly and shall proceed as provided for in the Administrative Instructions.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p301 ft23">Rule 47.1 – Procedure</P>
<P class="p1490 ft4"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft27">The communication provided for in Article 20 shall be effected by the International Bureau.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p483 ft6"><NOBR>(a-bis)</NOBR> The International Bureau shall notify each designated Office, at the time of the communication provided for in Article 20, of the fact and date of receipt of the record copy and of the fact and date of receipt of any priority document. Such notification shall also be sent to any designated Office which has waived the communication provided for in</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p515 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 10</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">454</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_455">
<DIV id="p455dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356455x1.jpg/" id="p455img1">
</DIV>


<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t21">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr9 td140"><P class="p3 ft4">Article 20, unless such Office has also waived the notification of its</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr9 td13"><P class="p3 ft7">Prop. 2006/07:56</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr5 td140"><P class="p3 ft13">designation.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr5 td13"><P class="p3 ft13">Bilaga 10</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr11 td140"><P class="p3 ft4"><NOBR>(a-ter)</NOBR> The notification under paragraph <NOBR>(a-bis)</NOBR> shall include any</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr11 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td140"><P class="p3 ft8">declaration referred to in Rule 4.17(i) to (iv), and any correction thereof</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td13"><P class="p3 ft9">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td140"><P class="p3 ft4">under Rule 26ter.1, which was received by the International Bureau</P></TD>

</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td140"><P class="p3 ft4">before the expiration of the time limit under Rule 26ter.1, provided that</P></TD>

</TABLE>
<P class="p445 ft6"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft150">Such communication shall be effected promptly after the international publication of the international application and, in any event, by the end of the 19th month after the priority date. Any amendment received by the International Bureau within the time limit under Rule 46.1 which was not included in the communication shall be communicated promptly to the designated Offices by the International Bureau, and the latter shall notify the applicant accordingly.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p445 ft6"><SPAN class="ft8">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft188">The International Bureau shall send a notice to the applicant indicating the designated Offices to which the communication has been effected and the date of such communication. Such notice shall be sent on the same day as the communication. Each designated Office shall be informed, separately from the communication, about the sending and the date of mailing of the notice. The notice shall be accepted by all designated Offices as conclusive evidence that the communication has duly taken place on the date specified in the notice.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p672 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft86">Each designated Office shall, when it so requires, receive the international search reports and the declarations referred to in Article 17(2)(a) also in the translation referred to in Rule 45.1.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p672 ft4"><SPAN class="ft7">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft35">Where any designated Office has waived the requirement provided under Article 20, the copies of the documents which otherwise would have been sent to that Office shall, at the request of that Office or the applicant, be sent to the applicant at the time of the notice referred to in paragraph (c).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p242 ft23">Rule 48.2 – Contents</P>
<P class="p258 ft4">(a) The pamphlet shall contain:</P>
<P class="p1491 ft4">(i)a standardized front page, (ii)the description, (iii)the claims,</P>
<P class="p1492 ft4">(iv)the drawings, if any,</P>
<P class="p1493 ft6">(v)subject to paragraph (g), the international search report or the declaration under Article 17(2)(a); the publication of the international search report in the pamphlet shall, however, not be required to include</P>
<P class="p174 ft88">the part of the international search report which contains only matter</P>
<P class="p390 ft4">455</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_456">
<DIV id="p456dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356456x1.jpg/" id="p456img1">
</DIV>


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p138 ft4">referred to in Rule 43 already appearing on the front page of the pamphlet,</P>
<P class="p1494 ft4">(vi)any statement filed under Article 19(1), unless the International Bureau finds that the statement does not comply with the provisions of Rule 46.4,</P>
<P class="p1494 ft4">(vii)any request for rectification referred to in the third sentence of Rule 91.1(f),</P>
<P class="p1495 ft4">(viii)the relevant data from any indications in relation to deposited biological material furnished under Rule 13bis separately from the description, together with an indication of the date on which the International Bureau received such indications,</P>
<P class="p1494 ft4">(ix)any information concerning a priority claim considered not to have been made under Rule 26bis.2(b), the publication of which is requested under Rule 26bis.2(c).</P>
<P class="p1495 ft4">(x)any declaration referred to in Rule 4.17(v), and any correction thereof under Rule 26ter.1, which was received by the International Bureau before the expiration of the time limit under Rule 26ter.1.</P>
<P class="p494 ft4">(b) Subject to paragraph (c), the front page shall include:</P>
<P class="p1496 ft4">(i)data taken from the request sheet and such other data as are prescribed by the Administrative Instructions,</P>
<P class="p1495 ft4">(ii)a figure or figures where the international application contains drawings, unless Rule 8.2(b) applies,</P>
<P class="p1494 ft4">(iii)the abstract; if the abstract is both in English and in another language, the English text shall appear first,</P>
<P class="p1494 ft4">(iv)an indication that the request contains any declaration referred to in Rule 4.17 which was received by the International Bureau before the expiration of the time limit under Rule 26ter.1.</P>
<P class="p497 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft21">Where a declaration under Article 17(2)(a) has issued, the front page shall conspicuously refer to that fact and need include neither a drawing nor an abstract.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1093 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft27">The figure or figures referred to in paragraph (b)(ii) shall be selected as provided in Rule 8.2. Reproduction of such figure or figures on the front page may be in a reduced form.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p504 ft4"><SPAN class="ft7">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft21">If there is not enough room on the front page for the totality of the abstract referred to in paragraph (b)(iii), the said abstract shall appear on the back of the front page. The same shall apply to the translation of the abstract when such translation is required to be published under Rule 48.3(c).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p506 ft6"><SPAN class="ft8">(f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft68">If the claims have been amended under Article 19, the publication shall contain either the full text of the claims both as filed and as amended or the full text of the claims as filed and specify the amendments. Any statement referred to in Article 19(1) shall be included as well, unless the International Bureau finds that the statement does not comply with the provisions of Rule 46.4. The date of receipt of the amended claims by the International Bureau shall be indicated.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p515 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 10</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">456</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_457">
<DIV id="p457dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356457x1.jpg/" id="p457img1">
</DIV>


<P class="p14 ft4">Prop. 2006/07:56</P>
<P class="p1497 ft4">(g) If, at the time of the completion of the technical preparations for Bilaga 10 international publication, the international search report is not yet available (for example, because of publication on the request of the applicant as provided in Articles 21(2)(b) and 64(3)(c)(i)), the pamphlet</P>
<P class="p233 ft4">shall contain, in place of the international search report, an indication to the effect that that report was not available and that either the pamphlet (then also including the international search report) will be republished or the international search report (when it becomes available) will be separately published.</P>
<P class="p673 ft6"><SPAN class="ft8">(h)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft68">If, at the time of the completion of the technical preparations for international publication, the time limit for amending the claims under Article 19 has not expired, the pamphlet shall refer to that fact and indicate that, should the claims be amended under Article 19, then, promptly after such amendments, either the pamphlet (containing the claims as amended) will be republished or a statement reflecting all the amendments will be published. In the latter case, at least the front page and the claims shall be republished and, if a statement under Article 19(1) has been filed, that statement shall be published as well, unless the International Bureau finds that the statement does not comply with the provisions of Rule 46.4.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p737 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft27">The Administrative Instructions shall determine the cases in which the various alternatives referred to in paragraphs (g) and (h) shall apply. Such determination shall depend on the volume and complexity of the amendments and/or the volume of the international application and the cost factors.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p242 ft23">Rule 51bis – Certain National Requirements Allowed Under</P>
<P class="p174 ft23">Article 27</P>
<P class="p258 ft8">51bis.1- Certain National Requirements Allowed</P>
<P class="p238 ft4"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft27">Subject to Rule 51bis.2, the national law applicable by the designated Office may, in accordance with Article 27, require the applicant to furnish, in particular:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1498 ft4">(i)any document relating to the identity of the inventor,</P>
<P class="p1499 ft4">(ii)any document relating to the applicant’s entitlement to apply for or be granted a patent,</P>
<P class="p1493 ft6">(iii)any document containing any proof of the applicant’s entitlement to claim priority of an earlier application where the applicant is not the applicant who filed the earlier application or where the applicant’s name has changed since the date on which the earlier application was filed,</P>
<P class="p1500 ft6">(iv)where the international application designates a State whose national law requires that national applications be filed by the inventor, any document containing an oath or declaration of inventorship,</P>
<P class="p1493 ft8">(v)any evidence concerning <NOBR>non-prejudicial</NOBR> disclosures or exceptions to lack of novelty, such as disclosures resulting from abuse, disclosures</P>
<P class="p550 ft4">457</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_458">
<DIV id="p458dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356458x1.jpg/" id="p458img1">
</DIV>


<DIV class="dclr"></DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1501 ft4">at certain exhibitions and disclosures by the applicant during a certain period of time.</P>
<P class="p1502 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft86">The national law applicable by the designated Office may, in accordance with Article 27(7), require that</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1503 ft4">(i)the applicant be represented by an agent having the right to represent applicants before that Office and/or have an address in the designated State for the purpose of receiving notifications,</P>
<P class="p1504 ft4">(ii)the agent, if any, representing the applicant be duly appointed by the applicant.</P>
<P class="p1460 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft86">The national law applicable by the designated Office may, in accordance with Article 27(1), require that the international application, the translation thereof or any document relating thereto be furnished in more than one copy.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1184 ft6"><SPAN class="ft8">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft188">The national law applicable by the designated Office may, in accordance with Article 27(2)(ii), require that the translation of the international application furnished by the applicant under Article 22 be:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1503 ft4">(i)verified by the applicant or the person having translated the international application in a statement to the effect that, to the best of his knowledge, the translation is complete and faithful;</P>
<P class="p1505 ft4">(ii)certified by a public authority or sworn translator, but only where the designated Office may reasonably doubt the accuracy of the translation.</P>
<P class="p1184 ft6"><SPAN class="ft7">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft188">The national law applicable by the designated Office may, in accordance with Article 27, require the applicant to furnish a translation of the priority document, provided that such a translation may only be required where the validity of the priority claim is relevant to the determination of whether the invention concerned is patentable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1460 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft21">If, on March 17, 2000, the proviso in paragraph (e) is not compatible with the national law applied by the designated Office, that proviso shall not apply in respect of that Office for as long as that proviso continues not to be compatible with that law, provided that the said Office informs the International Bureau accordingly by November 30, 2000. The information received shall be promptly published by the International Bureau in the Gazette.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1506 ft8">51bis.2 – Certain Circumstances in Which Documents or Evidence May Not Be Required</P>
<P class="p1507 ft4"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft87">Where the applicable national law does not require that national applications be filed by the inventor, the designated Office shall not, unless it may reasonably doubt the veracity of the indications or declaration concerned, require any document or evidence:</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p599 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 10</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">458</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_459">
<DIV id="p459dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356459x1.jpg/" id="p459img1">
</DIV>


<DIV class="dclr"></DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1494 ft4">(i)relating to the identity of the inventor (Rule 51bis.1(a)(i)), if indications concerning the inventor, in accordance with Rule 4.6, are contained in the request or if a declaration as to the identity of the inventor, in accordance with Rule 4.17(i), is contained in the request or is submitted directly to the designated Office;</P>
<P class="p1508 ft32"><SPAN class="ft4">(ii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft127">relating to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to apply for and be granted a patent (Rule 51bis.1(a)(ii)), if a declaration as to that matter, in accordance with Rule 4.17(ii), is contained in the request or is submitted directly to the designated Office; (iii)relating to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to claim priority of an earlier application (Rule 51bis.1(a)(iii)), if a declaration as to that matter, in accordance with Rule 4.17(iii), is contained in the request or is submitted directly to the designated Office.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p504 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft21">Where the applicable national law requires that national applications be filed by the inventor, the designated Office shall not, unless it may reasonably doubt the veracity of the indications or declaration concerned, require any document or evidence:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1509 ft4">(i)relating to the identity of the inventor (Rule 51bis.1(a)(i)) (other than a document containing an oath or declaration of inventorship (Rule 51bis.1(a)(iv))), if indications concerning the inventor, in accordance with Rule 4.6, are contained in the request;</P>
<P class="p1510 ft6">(ii)relating to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to claim priority of an earlier application (Rule 51bis.1(a)(iii)), if a declaration as to that matter, in accordance with Rule 4.17(iii), is contained in the request or is submitted directly to the designated Office; (iii)containing an oath or declaration of inventorship (Rule 51bis.1(a)(iv)), if a declaration of inventorship, in accordance with Rule 4.17(iv), is contained in the request or is submitted directly to the</P>
<P class="p603 ft4">designated Office.</P>
<P class="p483 ft6"><SPAN class="ft8">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft178">If, on March 17, 2000, paragraph (a) is not compatible, in relation to any item of that paragraph, with the national law applied by the designated Office, paragraph (a) shall not apply in respect of that Office in relation to that item for as long as it continues not to be compatible with that law, provided that the said Office informs the International Bureau accordingly by November 30, 2000. The information received shall be promptly published by the International Bureau in the Gazette.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p265 ft8">51bis.3 – Opportunity to Comply with National Requirements</P>
<P class="p316 ft6"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft150">Where any of the requirements referred to in Rule 51bis.1(a)(i) to (iv) and (c) to (e), or any other requirement of the national law applicable by the designated Office which that Office may apply in accordance with Article 27(1) or (2), is not already fulfilled during the same period within which the requirements under if Article 22 must be complied with, the designated Office circumstances,shall invite the applicant to comply with the requirement within a time limit which shall innot be less than two months from the date of the invitation. Each designated Office may</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p515 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 10</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">459</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_460">
<DIV id="p460dimg1">
<INGENBILD zsrc="GU0356460x1.jpg/" id="p460img1">
</DIV>


<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t21">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr9 td140"><P class="p3 ft4">require that the applicant pay a fee for complying with national</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr9 td13"><P class="p3 ft7">Prop. 2006/07:56</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr4 td140"><P class="p3 ft4">requirements in response to the invitation.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr4 td13"><P class="p3 ft4">Bilaga 10</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P class="p672 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft86">Where any requirement of the national law applicable by the designated Office which that Office may apply in accordance with Article 27(6) or (7) is not already fulfilled during the same period within which the requirements under Article 22 must be complied with, the applicant shall have an opportunity to comply with the requirement after the expiration of that period.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p672 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft87">If, on March 17, 2000, paragraph (a) is not compatible with the national law applied by the designated Office in relation to the time limit referred to in that paragraph, the said paragraph shall not apply in respect of that Office in relation to that time limit for as long as the said paragraph continues not to be compatible with that law, provided that the said Office informs the International Bureau accordingly by November 30, 2000. The information received shall be promptly published by the International Bureau in the Gazette.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p6 ft23">The Administrative Instructions</P>
<P class="p258 ft4">Section 211 (New) – Declaration as to the Identity of the Inventor</P>
<P class="p1511 ft4"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft21">Any declaration as to the identity of the inventor, referred to in Rule 4.17(i), shall be worded as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1512 ft4">“Declaration as to the identity of the inventor (Rules 4.17(i) and 51bis.1(a)(i)):</P>
<P class="p1513 ft4">in relation to [this] international application [No. PCT/…],</P>
<P class="p1514 ft4">(i)… (<SPAN class="ft5">name</SPAN>) of … (<SPAN class="ft5">address</SPAN>) is the inventor of the subject matter for which protection is sought by way of [the] [this] international application</P>
<P class="p1515 ft4">(ii)this declaration is made for the purposes of (<SPAN class="ft5">include as applicable</SPAN>):</P>
<P class="p1516 ft4">(a)all designations [except the designation of the United States of America]</P>
<P class="p1516 ft4">(b)the following designations for national and/or regional patents: …”</P>
<P class="p682 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft35">This declaration need not be made if the name and address of the inventor are otherwise indicated in the request.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p887 ft17"><SPAN class="ft8">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft172">This declaration may, where applicable, be combined, in accordance with Section 212(b), with the declaration referred to in Section 212(a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1517 ft4">460</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_461">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1518 ft4">Section 212 (New) – Declaration as to the Applicant’s Entitlement to Apply for and Be Granted a Patent</P>
<P class="p1519 ft6"><SPAN class="ft7">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft36">Any declaration as to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to apply for and be granted a patent, referred to in Rule 4.17(ii), shall be worded as follows, with such inclusion, omission, repetition and </SPAN><NOBR>re-ordering</NOBR> of the matters listed as items (i) to (viii) as is necessary to explain the applicant’s entitlement:</P>
<P class="p1520 ft4">“Declaration as to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to apply for and be granted a patent (Rules 4.17(ii) and 51bis.1(a)(ii)), in a case where the declaration under Rule 4.17(iv) is not appropriate:</P>
<P class="p1466 ft4">in relation to [this] international application [No. PCT/…],</P>
<P class="p1521 ft4"><SPAN class="ft4">…</SPAN><SPAN class="ft27">(</SPAN><SPAN class="ft5">name</SPAN>) is entitled to apply for and be granted a patent by virtue of the following:</P>
<P class="p1522 ft8">(i)… (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>) of … (<SPAN class="ft26">address</SPAN>) is the inventor of the subject matter for which protection is sought by way of [the] [this] international application (ii)… (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>) [is] [was] entitled as employer of the inventor, …</P>
<P class="p1523 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">(</SPAN>inventor’s name<SPAN class="ft4">)</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1524 ft8">(iii)an agreement between … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>) and … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>), dated … (iv)an assignment from … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>) to … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>), dated … (v)consent from … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>) in favor of … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>), dated …</P>
<P class="p1525 ft4">(vi)a court order issued by … (<SPAN class="ft5">name of court</SPAN>), effecting a transfer from … (<SPAN class="ft5">name</SPAN>) to … (<SPAN class="ft5">name</SPAN>), dated …</P>
<P class="p1526 ft4">(vii)transfer of entitlement from … (<SPAN class="ft5">name</SPAN>) to … (<SPAN class="ft5">name</SPAN>) by way of … (<SPAN class="ft5">specify kind of transfer</SPAN>), dated …</P>
<P class="p1527 ft8">(viii)the applicant’s name changed from … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>) to … (<SPAN class="ft26">name</SPAN>) on</P>
<P class="p1527 ft5"><SPAN class="ft4">…</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">(</SPAN>date<SPAN class="ft4">)</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1525 ft4">(ix)this declaration is made for the purposes of (<SPAN class="ft5">include as applicable</SPAN>):</P>
<P class="p1528 ft4">(a)all designations [except the designation of the United States of America]</P>
<P class="p1529 ft4">(b)the following designations for national and/or regional patents: ”</P>
<P class="p1530 ft4"><SPAN class="ft8">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft27">The declaration referred to in paragraph (a) may, where applicable, be combined with the declaration referred to in Section 211(a), in which case the introductory phrase shall be worded as follows and the remainder of the combined declaration shall be worded as prescribed in paragraph (a):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1520 ft4">“Combined declaration as to the applicant’s entitlement, as at the international filing date, to apply for and be granted a patent (Rules 4.17(ii) and 51bis.1(a)(ii)) and as to the identity of the inventor (Rules 4.17(i) and 51bis.1(a)(i)), in a case where the declaration under Rule 4.17(iv) is not appropriate:”</P>
</DIV>

<P class="p515 ft17">Prop. 2006/07:56 Bilaga 10</P>
<P class="p516 ft4">461</P>

<P class="p1536 ft4">462</P>
